message.bt-1: The most important feature of the system is to buy a ticket, you need to follow these steps to buy a ticket.

message.cnw1: To use advanced features such as buying tickets, viewing ticket purchase history..., you need to connect the website to your metamask wallet by following these steps
message.cnw2: When you access PenguinLott website, it will be showed you a notification to connect to the Metamask. If the notification don't appear, you can click Connect wallet button in the right corner in Navigation bar
message.cnw3: And then, another window will be appeared, please click
message.cnw5: Add network notification will be showed to ask you the permission to add new network (BSC) to Metamask (If you had BSC in your Metamask, this notification will be passed), please click
message.cnw6: When you are in wrong network (no BSC network), a notification to switch network to valid network (BSC network ) will be appeared. (If you are currently in BSC network, this notification will be passed). Please click
message.cnw7: If these information are appeared in navigation bar, you has already connected
message.cw1: MetaMask is a type of Ethereum wallet that bridges the gap between the user interfaces for Ethereum (For example, Mist browsers, DApps) and the regular web (For example, Google Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, websites). Its function is to inject a JavaScript library called web3.js into the namespace of each page your browser loads. Web3.js is written by the Ethereum core team. MetaMask is mainly used as a plugin in the web browser. Let’s walk through the steps to install it on Google Chrome
message.cw2: Check the number of downloads to make sure that the legitimate MetaMask is being installed, as hackers might try to make clones of it.
message.cw5: Once installation is complete this page will be displayed. Click on the

message.cw14: Create a password for your wallet. This password is to be entered every time the browser is launched and wants to use MetaMask. A new password needs to be created if chrome is uninstalled or if there is a switching of browsers. In that case, go through the

message.cw26: One can access MetaMask in the browser by clicking the Foxface icon on the top right. If the Foxface icon is not visible, then click on the puzzle piece icon right next to it.
message.ft1: In order to ensure that users have a good experience, we have detailed instructions for each function of the PenguinLott website below
message.ft3: Follow these guides to get everything set up to use PenguinLott, or feel free to jump to the guide you need if you've been doing okay but lost your way
message.gs1: Using anything new can be a bit of a challenge. Don't worry though, we've created a range of guides to help you get comfortable with PenguinLott
message.gs3: Follow these guides to get everything set up to use PenguinLott, or feel free to jump to the guide you need if you've been doing okay but lost your way
message.gt1: In order to buy tickets and participate in the lottery, you need to have a certain balance of BNB tokens to make transactions on the Blockchain platform, in addition, the website also uses ERC-20 standard USDT tokens for value. system transactions. On this testnet, I will show you how to get money before you want to join the system. With great pleasure

message.h1: Bet and win crypto on the most popular decentralized platform
message.h6: PenguinLott has the most users of any decentralized platform, ever.
message.h61: And those users are now entrusting the platform with over $12 billion in funds
message.h17: Connect your crypto wallet to start using the app in seconds
message.l7: The lottery session has stopped buying tickets
message.l19: Want to check deals with Penguin Lott
message.l25: If the digits on your tickets match the winning numbers in the correct order, you win a portion of the prize pool
message.l27: Prices are set when the round starts, equal to 1 USDT per ticket
message.l29: There is one draw every day alternating between 6 PM UTC +7
message.l31: Once the round’s over, come back to the page and check to see if you’ve won
message.l33: The digits on your ticket must match in the correct order to win
message.l34: Here’s an example lottery draw, with two tickets, A and B
message.l35: Ticket A: Both numbers match the result so this ticket is the winning ticket
message.l36: Ticket B: Both numbers match but the order is wrong so this ticket does not win
message.l37: Lottery tickets include 2 digits, every 6pm every day UTC +7, the system automatically chooses a 2 digit number, whoever gets 2 digits completely will be the winner of all the rewards in the pool
message.l39: The prizes for each lottery round come from two sources
message.l41: 100% of the USDT paid by people buying tickets that round goes back into the prize pools
message.l43: After every round, if nobody wins in one of the prize brackets, the unclaimed USDT for that bracket rolls over into the next round and are redistributed among the prize pools
message.m2: Please enter address and amount of USDT you want to mint
message.t1: PenguinLott is a lottery platform with 3 advantages: Safe, Transparency, Fast
message.t3: Thanks to the use of blockchain technology, all tokens that you transact with PenguinLott are absolutely safe, when you buy a ticket with USDT, the token will be deposited into the smart contract, it is kept in it and will be distributed to the winners
message.t5: Your transactions can be seen by everyone, everywhere. The amount accumulated will ensure transparency, and when there is a winner it also automatically sends the tokens in the fund to those people. This ensures the fairness of the game
message.t7: Just a few clicks, and the amount if you win will be immediately sent to your account without complicated procedures, which greatly improves the speed of the process
message.vtv1: After buying the ticket, you can check ticket which you bought in this round
message.vtv5: Scroll to this section and click
message.vtv6: You will see a modal has information of all tickets you bought in this round
message.vtv9: Scroll to this section and click
message.vtv11: You will see a modal has information of all tickets you bought in all round
